titleStmt.title: The Mercury-gallant containing many true and pleasant relations of what hath passed at Paris, from the first of January 1672. Till the Kings departure thence. Translated from the French.
titleStmt.author: J. D.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. and N.T. for Dorman Newman at the Kings Arms in the Poultry, and Jonathan Edwin at the Three Roses in Ludgate-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
